fullText: Donald Margulies' new play 'Time Stands Still' is a thoughtful, well-crafted drama about war correspondents dealing with trauma and the ethics of their profession.
dtliExcerpt: Donald Margulies' new play 'Time Stands Still' is a thoughtful, well-crafted drama about war correspondents dealing with trauma and the ethics of their profession.
